contents:
Rebecca, please excuse me for the unsolicited advice...

Thanks for the advice. Very kind of you.
It's been a whole week of pincong politics. Sorry if any of you peaceful Alaskans felt disturbed.

A few words about the things I said earlier:
- I do judge people a lot, but very rarely do I make mistakes. In the case of the user Mephisto, he really needs a doctor.
- I never accuse people of anything they didn't do (bottom line).
- I'm not interested in verbal fights. I'm more of a point-out-the-obvious kind of person. Certain people took it as offensive.
- I don't know the actual reason for my INSPECTING status. The only thing I know is that the owner of the site himself did it.
- The site owner is the only man I can't and never willing to fight against. Hence the immediate apology (even though I still don't know what he meant)
